list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: added banner support on shields, and trim support for gauntlets

task.summary: Default task
update README.md
added crossbows and refactored item texture names
added arrows
added quivers and their ability to hold arrows
fixed quiver bug
added arrow item pickup into quiver
added arrow entity pickup into quiver fixed quiver gui rendering
abandoned saving items to quiver
made gui rendering of quiver more flexible and less visually cluttered
arrow slots now don't render the hover sheen when not used
refactored config and merged all materials
added weapons back
data gen fixes
item colors now work
fix generated data
added tipped arrow recipe and potion weapon recipe
lots of recipe bug fixing
lots of recipe bug fixing
fixed shield recipes again
fixed potion weapon dipping recipe
added non-vanilla swords to proper tags for recipes
added fiery burn and knight metal extra damage based on armor
added weapon large ing hand models
a bunch of tooltip stuff
a bunch of tooltip stuff
fixed gauntlet damage when holding weapons
added fletching table functionality and all associated recipes
added fletching table functionality and all associated recipes
fixed arrow dupe bug
finished quiver hud
fixed some bugs involving quivers arrows and materials
fixed weapon model rotations and positions in hand
jei support for fletching and quiver not tested yet
jei support for fletching confirmed works
added jei support for Shield smithing
added better combat support
updated README.md and mods.toml
updated README.md
updated README.md
fixed half of scythe render bug
gauntlets now render in first person
wood and stone materials re added
leather gauntlets are not dyeable like leather armor
model stuff
shields now use entity models instead of item models
fixed shield upgrading bug
added banner support on shields, and trim support for gauntlets
working form of jei registry created and moved onto material additions
created new resource src and moved all files only needed for datagen to it
